manifest:
<control namespace="<%= controlNamespace %>" constructor="<%= controlName %>" version="0.0.1" display-name-key="<%= controlName %>" description-key="<%= controlName %> description" control-type="standard" preview-image="img/preview.png" >
<css path="css/<%= controlName %>.css" order="1" /> <resx path="strings/<%= controlName %>.1033.resx" version="1.0.0" />
